testimonials.text:
“Hi! My name is Somu.” said a girl in white frock 20 years ago to a girl who had no idea about the lifetime package that came with her.
The story has a lot of chapters but little did we know that we would become
From strangers to best friends forever
From talking about what to play today to what to chose in life to never ending list.
It’s amazing to see such a pretty girl turn into a beautiful woman.
And being with you in that process is such a blessing. You’ve always said to maintain stuff, efforts from both the ends matter.
Since you’ve always been on my side
I never realised how important you are to me,
Until I was about to lose you.
Since that day there has been no day that I didn’t put my step ahead and live up to what we’re entitled too - BFF
Obviously can’t imagine to lose a gem like you. Even though I’m uncertain about some things in life but I’m certain that I love you and will genuinely continue to love you forever.
It’s already been 20 years and I know it would continue till the last breath
Can’t blame myself for such a dramatic speech
After all it was for you lol.

Happy Birthday babe!
Perfect Summing up of ‘US’❤️ for me would be a two way time-to-time ‘You can count on me, like one two three and I’ll be there’❤️
Cheers to years of rants, same choices, sharing(to the level of having the same crush!😂), biology discussions(Duh!😅),shitty decisions, growing up together, first share of the happiest or the worst news, crying and laughing and what not…..things already done and things to come!❤️ Let’s keep this writeup all good only for now!😂
Love you🤭❤️

It's difficult to describe Soumya with 1 word, but I can say she is a feeling similar to a sunny day amidst winter. She can cheer up anyone in the room just by existing. She has an extremely unique talent of not making sense or talking nonsense, but when ever you need a friend to hear you out she is always the one for you.
